text.b: S O C I A L M E D I A C U S T O M E R S T R A T E G Y S P E C I A L I S T

text.i: Bachelors in English (Writing), Minor in Technical/Professional Communications
Wrote four blurbs, a roundup and a profile piece; conducted
face-to-face interviews; published a story in The Slate
Wrote four event reviews for print media; published two
reviews in student newspaper
Wrote a 20-page report on improving student employment
in Shippensburg University’s dining facilities; used fonts,
type size and margins to appeal to readers
Computer-based class focusing on the key concepts of
graphic design; learned how to effectively design various
page layouts using Adobe InDesign and Photoshop
Edited copy for print and web media; created a four-page
newspaper; wrote two news stories; edited roughly 15 news
stories for grammatical correctness and consistency
Wrote and recorded a radio broadcast script; wrote and
recorded a TV broadcast script; briefly operated TV studio
equipment including cameras, sound and live feed display
Intern, August 2013 – Present

page.text: Trained in SEO best practices including link building, web content writing and social media management;
learned how to create and manage social media content for marketing purposes; wrote several blog posts on
social media management; updated multiple blogs for the company on a bi-weekly basis; guest blogged for
outside blogs; wrote webpage copy for clients’ sites; wrote content for company’s e-book
SHIPPENSBURG UNIVERSITY ENGLISH DEPARTMENT, Shippensburg, PA

text.i: Student Editor of Write the Ship, January 2013 – May 2013

page.text: Managed publication’s Facebook page; decided which pieces of work to include in the journal’s next issue;
contacted selected students and suggested grammatical revisions; awarded prizes to outstanding
submissions; decided cover art and cover formatting; updated the text formatting and layout

text.i: Intern, August 2012 – December 2012

page.text: Wrote four medium-length articles about alumni careers and volunteer work; wrote a four-page spread
about a large construction project on campus; re-published a story in Highway Builder Magazine;
interviewed personnel involved in articles; proofread copy for the summer 2012 and fall 2012 issues
Graduated summa cum laude; received the Class of 1953 Scholarship from fall 2010 – spring 2013; received the
SU Foundation Scholarship from spring 2010 – spring 2013; was published twice in The Slate as a guest writer in
spring 2012 and once again in spring 2013
